title: Tickboard Run Information Display
description:
Enhance tickboard to display rich run information from agent execution. Two main features:

1. **Run Summary Tab** - In the tick detail drawer, add a 'Run' tab showing the RunRecord for completed ticks (output, thinking, tools used, metrics, verification status)

2. **Live Output Panel Tabs** - Enhance the live output panel to have tabs for:
   - Streaming output (existing functionality)
   - Context document (markdown rendered from .tick/logs/context/<epic-id>.md)

Data sources:
- RunRecord via /api/records/:tickId
- Context docs at .tick/logs/context/<epic-id>.md
- SSE streaming via /api/run-stream/:epicId

UI patterns: Lit components, Shoelace UI library, collapsible sections
closed_reason: Complete - Run tab in tick detail drawer, Context tab in run output panel, live streaming working
